typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SSN as integer,
		First_Name as string,
		Phone_N as string,
		Last_M as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1oltp
source(output(
		SSN as integer,
		First_Name as string,
		Phone_N as string,
		Last_M as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1oltp exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
